structure.unit: ARTICLE XXXVII. MIAMI INTERNATIONAL AIRPORT (WILCOX FIELD) ZONING

law.catch_line: Provisions hereof established as minimum standards governing zoning.

text.section:
Sec. 33-331. Provisions hereof established as minimum standards governing zoning.
It is established that the airport zoning area for Miami International Airport (Wilcox Field), the zone classification districts therein and the height limitations applicable to such districts, as the same are hereinafter set forth, shall be incorporated with all other minimum standards governing zoning heretofore or hereinafter adopted pursuant to Section 4.07 of the Home Rule Charter for Miami-Dade County, Florida.
